name: RED BEAT
description:
Short game made in a week for the Summer Slow Jam. 

Instructions:

  • Use the arrow keys (Up, Left, and Right) to navigate the menu and play the game.
  • Hit the corresponding arrow key to the beat of the music when the monsters are in the boxes to kill them.
  • The music will get faster with every point you get.
  • Beat my high score of 168!
  • Don't spam the keys or else you will fail.

Beats/music by MckayCraft.

Other sound effects by soundbible.com
